abstract: Obama administration requests Supreme Court to take unusual step of reconsidering major immigration decision when full nine-member court can hear case; court had deadlocked in original case, which challenged Obama's plan to stop millions of unauthorized immigrants from deportation and to let them work in country.
snippet: The justices deadlocked last month over a challenge to President Obama’s plan to spare millions of unauthorized immigrants from deportation....
lead_paragraph: The justices deadlocked last month over a challenge to President Obama’s plan to spare millions of unauthorized immigrants from deportation.

headline.main: Administration Asks Supreme Court to Rehear Immigration Case Once It’s Full
headline.print_headline: Administration Asks Justices to Rehear Immigration Case
